## SqlConfiguration interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Configuration for SQL resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SqlConfiguration 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [sqlDatabaseName?](./teamsfx.sqlconfiguration.sqldatabasename.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> SQL server database name. |
|  [sqlIdentityId?](./teamsfx.sqlconfiguration.sqlidentityid.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Managed identity id. Specify if username &amp; password is not used. |
|  [sqlPassword?](./teamsfx.sqlconfiguration.sqlpassword.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> SQL server password. Used together with "sqlUsername". |
|  [sqlServerEndpoint](./teamsfx.sqlconfiguration.sqlserverendpoint.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> SQL server endpoint. |
|  [sqlUsername?](./teamsfx.sqlconfiguration.sqlusername.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> SQL server username. Used together with "sqlPassword". |
